h2_title: Rusty-Gold Cart Boss Fight and Guide
content: When it does go to take a swipe at you, try to roll toward it. You'll either end up going underneath it or to the side of it and dodging the attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rusty-Gold_Cart.md', within the main section titled 'Rusty-Gold Cart', specifically from the subsection 'Rusty-Gold Cart Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When it does go to take a swipe at you, try to roll toward it. You'll either end up going underneath it or to the side of it and dodging the attack.
